tool_description: Estimates survey completion time and analyzes survey length impact on response rates, providing recommendations for optimal survey duration based on question types and complexity.

total_questions.description: Total number of questions in the survey

question_breakdown.description: Breakdown of question types and their counts

has_open_ended.description: Whether the survey includes open-ended questions

branching_complexity.description: Complexity of conditional logic: none, simple, moderate, or complex

target_audience.description: Target audience type: general, business, academic, or technical

error_messages: Invalid total questions: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 500.
Invalid branching complexity: Use one of [none, simple, moderate, complex].
Invalid target audience: Use one of [general, business, academic, technical].
Question breakdown error: question_breakdown must contain valid question type identifiers.
Total questions mismatch: The sum of question_breakdown should align with total_questions.
usage: Provide total_questions, question_breakdown, has_open_ended, and branching_complexity. Optionally set target_audience. The tool calculates completion time estimates and provides duration recommendations.

length_assessment.description: Assessment of survey length: optimal, acceptable, long, or excessive
